message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I think it's fair, and I hope you'll agree.
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases for both of us as we progress, but it diminishes faster for you.
Let's split it evenly this time. We're both losing money with each round, so a 50/50 split is the fairest option right now.
